data.title: Big flavor in a tiny package
data.text: This may just be the smallest restaurant ever to earn my five stars.  I say restaurant because they do have eat in facilities totaling two small tables.  Most of their business is carry out and delivery to the offices in the building and around the fountains.  The food is incredible whether you want a simple sandwich or wrap, baklava or any of their homemade treats.  There are even vegetarian items for those of us who do not eat our fellow beings.  The Mediterranean offerings are authentic.
